com.aleragroup.arch.proxyservice.exception

Class ProxyServiceExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aleragroup.arch.proxyservice.exception.ProxyServiceExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ProxyServiceExceptionHandler
extends Object
    Controller advice class for handling specific uncaught exceptions.

    • Method Detail

      • handleProxyServiceResponseException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=ProxyServiceResponseException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity handleProxyServiceResponseException(ProxyServiceResponseException exception)
        Handles thrown ProxyServiceResponseExceptions.
        Parameters:
        exception - exception instance needed to obtain status code, headers, and body.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity matching the response returned by the responding server.

      • handleUnsupportedEncodingException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity handleUnsupportedEncodingException()
                                                                                                                                               throws org.json.JSONException
        UnsupportedEncodingException will never be thrown unless UTF-8 becomes an invalid encoding (see MainController).
        Returns:
        500 Internal Server Error ResponseEntity.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - will never be thrown.

      • handleIOException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.io.IOException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity handleIOException()
                                                                                                             throws org.json.JSONException
        Handles thrown IOExceptions.
        Returns:
        400 Bad Request ResponseEntity.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - will never be thrown.
